keepConnect.name: Fuirich ceangailte
keepConnect.helperText: Ma bhriogas tu air a 'cheangal Start, an uairsin cùm an ceangal. Feumaidh seo aire gun tèid an ceangal ath-cheangal gu leantainneach às deidh a bhith air a dhì-cheangal.

url.name: URL
url.helperText: Link URL, mar eisimpleir WS: //192.168.0.2: 7001, no wWS: //example.com/path
url.error: Is e URL ceart URL a th 'ann an URL a' tòiseachadh le WS: // no WWS: //
